item.description:
Ha-hah! An early notice this time, so early that a few of you will likely intend to come, then forget about it by the time that next Monday rolls around. Hope not, but that's a risk I'll have to take.

In any case, my wife and I are hosting game night at our home in Concord once again, starting at 7pm and running until people leave. I can always suggest games to play from our library, or you can bring ones of your own – in either case, we'll never be short of fun games to play.

RSVP if you're in – hope to see you here!

Eric
item.name: Gaming in Concord, NH
